macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Indexes Decline on Thursday Amid AI Worries and Oil Price Surge
items.summary: The S&P 500 fell 0.3% to 6,861.90, Dow dropped 0.5% to 49,395.16, and Nasdaq lost 0.3% to 22,682.73, marking the S&P's first loss in four days; oil prices climbed due to US-Iran tensions.

items.title: Markets on Edge as Trump Issues 10-Day Deadline to Iran
items.summary: Geopolitical tensions rise with Trump's 10-day ultimatum to Iran, contributing to market volatility; major US indices showed minimal weekly gains with Dow down 0.2%, while oil surged 11-12%.

items.title: Fed Minutes Signal Hawkish Stance, Dimming Rate Cut Hopes
items.summary: January FOMC minutes reveal diminished labor market risks, persistent inflation above 2%, and projections of hotter growth through 2028, with some members open to rate hikes; markets seek insurance amid risks.

items.title: Booking Holdings and Private-Credit Firms Plunge on AI Competition Fears
items.summary: Booking.com's parent company suffered sharp losses amid concerns over AI rivals eroding its customer base; private-credit lenders to AI-vulnerable businesses also fell significantly.

items.title: Russell 2000 Bucks Trend with Gains as Upcoming PMI Data Looms
items.summary: Small-cap Russell 2000 rose 0.2% to 2,665.09 amid broader market dips; February S&P Global PMI expected to show perking US economic growth, with data often beating forecasts in 2026.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Options Expiry: $2 Billion Event Could Spark Volatility Today
items.summary: A massive $2 billion Bitcoin options expiry on Deribit at 8:00 a.m. UTC today, alongside $410 million in Ethereum options, may lead to significant market volatility due to hedging activities and historical patterns of price swings.

items.title: Bitcoin Price Forecast Predicts Decline to Below $52,305 After Resistance Test
items.summary: Bitcoin is expected to test resistance near $68,605 today, followed by a downward rebound targeting below $52,305, with a potential bullish reversal only if it breaks above $74,665.

items.title: JPMorgan Anticipates Larger Crypto Inflows in 2026 Driven by Institutional Capital
items.summary: Following a record 2025, JPMorgan expects 2026 to focus on crypto market integration with increased institutional inflows, shifting away from speculative cycles.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: GLM-5 Open-Source Release Marks Shift to Agentic Engineering AI
items.summary: GLM-5, a new open-source large language model with 744 billion parameters, excels in autonomous engineering tasks, achieving top benchmarks like 77.8 on SWE-bench-Verified and surpassing Google's Gemini 3 Pro in software engineering evaluations. It advances from code generation to full system execution with features like Slime reinforcement learning and DeepSeek Sparse Attention.

items.title: Stanford HAI and AWS Launch Marketing Science Lab for AI Tools
items.summary: Stanford's Human-Centered AI Institute (HAI), Stanford Data Science, Graduate School of Business, and AWS have launched a new lab to advance AI and machine learning for marketing measurement, causal inference, and B2B customer journey analysis, promising open-source code and prototypes.

items.title: Cornell Develops AI Framework for Predicting High-Conductivity Battery Electrolytes
items.summary: Researchers at Cornell University unveiled an AI framework published on Feb. 19 that predicts lithium-ion battery electrolyte performance with 65% reduced error, revealing chemical interactions of salts, solvents, and conditions to aid next-generation battery design.

items.title: InformationWeek Highlights 2026 AI Trends for Enterprises and CIOs
items.summary: Recent articles discuss agentic AI's rise in finance, AI integration challenges for CIOs, 2026 predictions on fragmentation and commodification, and the need to govern AI outputs amid cybersecurity and IT service desk advancements.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: ByteDance Nears $6 Billion Sale of Moonton to Savvy Games
items.summary: ByteDance is reportedly close to selling its gaming unit Moonton, known for Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, to Saudi Arabia’s Savvy Games for $6 billion, strengthening Savvy’s mobile and esports portfolio.

items.title: Mewgenics Roguelike Sells 1 Million Copies in One Week
items.summary: The roguelike hit Mewgenics has achieved 1 million sales in just one week, highlighting success in innovative indie titles amid industry growth.

items.title: Valve Warns of Steam Deck OLED Stock Issues Due to RAM Shortage
items.summary: Valve confirms intermittent out-of-stock status for Steam Deck OLED due to ongoing RAM and storage shortages caused by AI demand, impacting hardware manufacturers.

items.title: Netmarble Announces Global Launch for StoneAge Idle Adventure
items.summary: Netmarble has revealed the global launch date for its upcoming mobile idle RPG StoneAge Idle Adventure.

items.title: Nintendo Considers Switch 2 Price Increase Amid RAM Shortages
items.summary: Nintendo is reportedly eyeing a price hike for Switch 2 due to rising RAM costs from AI hype, alongside concerns over its release lineup.

items.title: Unity Claims AI Will Soon Prompt Full Casual Games Into Existence
items.summary: Unity's leadership states its generative AI technology will enable developers to create entire casual games via prompts.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
